project_abstract.cdata: The Road Improvement and Maintenance Project consists of: improving about 440 miles of paved main roads by provision of asphaltic overlay, maintenance of a further 250 miles by provision of asphaltic resealing, and associated minor works; the provision of road maintenance equipment and a small quantity of workshop equipment and tools; improvement in the staffing and procedures of the Ministry of Works insofar as they relate to road maintenance and a restructuring of the Directorate of Maintenance; a five year program of technical assistance to help implement all aspects of the project.
